name: A is for Again
description:
A short, monochromatic reflex game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam.

Use the arrow keys to move the shield as the player follows a path around the letter.

NOTE: The game has some bugs that I was unable to fix by the deadline. Occasionally, fast moving spikes shoot through the shield. Try to hold down the arrow key when being shot if it keeps happening; that seemed to help.
